title: Chomsky Talks. Noam answers questions. Part 2
description:
Following Chomsky's dire warning to the solar industry, in Albuquerque, June 21, 2022, Noam has been answering questions with regard to his message. This is the final installment.
This episode deals with questions from the solar industry perspective and has a short segment featuring Kelly Gerling, PhD and constitutional philosophy, specifically addressing the likelihood of abolishing our antiquated constitution in favor of writing a new one.
